detaileddescription.para: If we use invocation we can type-cast the result to a ModularModel
Override in concrete classes to provide an array of fields which this extension adds.
If SingleFieldName and SingleFieldSchema constants are set then will scaffold a suitable for field for them, however complex fields requiring drop-down lists etc won't be populated.
If static.SingleFieldName && static.SingleFieldSchema are set add them to db array.
Update summary fields to use Label from localisation yml if it exists.
Return the value of the implemented SingleField on the extended model.
Return a map of fieldname => value for data relevant to only this extension.
Returns a numerically keyed map of field names relevant to this extension.
Add any additional constraints, display_logic logic etc, this is called by extension on the extended model.
TODO rename to extendedFieldConstraints
Returns an array of field constraints for the named field as defined in config.validation, so [minlength, maxlength, pattern] or defaults (which is no checks) if not found.

parameterdescription.para: to use if not found in config for that field = no validation performed

detaileddescription.para: Return the name (path) of the tab in the cms this model's fields should show under from config.cms_tab_name in:
this extension or if not set from the extended model or if not set then self.DefaultTabName.
Set field decorations, e.g. label, guide information etc
Add any attributes, e.g. html5 validation, placeholder
Return a stripped out length of a value excluding whitespace and tags.
If a fieldName is a relationship name then returns a nice label for the remote class name, otherwise empty array. Only handles many_many at the moment.
TODO: handle has_many and has_one

simplesect.para: array of [singular, plural] names or empty array if not found.

detaileddescription.para: Configure date fields to be in various states as per parameter options.
Configures the Date and Time fields in the wrapping DatetimeField.
Returns the RelationshipName for this field if set, optionally appended with the fieldName as for a relationship.

parameterdescription.para: if supplied will be added on to RelationshipName with a '.' prefix
